summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spanish cargo transport platform - backend APIs mostly functional (92.9% success), frontend UI working excellently with minor chat widget interaction issue

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Cloudflare error when processing AI chat requests
critical_bugs.impact: Chat functionality completely broken - AI integration failing
critical_bugs.details: Server appears to crash or timeout when processing Emergent AI requests. All other endpoints working correctly.

working_endpoints: /api/stats - Returns dashboard statistics (11 cargas, 3 envios, etc)
/api/cargas - Returns list of 12 cargas with proper structure
/api/envios - Returns list of envios with progress tracking

ui_bugs.issue: Chat button not clickable due to 'Made with Emergent' badge overlay interception
ui_bugs.workaround: Can be clicked with force=True but prevents normal user interaction

integration_issues.issue: Chat widget cannot open due to overlay issue + backend chat API failing

working_features: Dashboard stats loading correctly from API (11 cargas disponibles, 3 envios en curso)
Navigation between all pages (Panel, Mapa, Envios, Transportistas) working perfectly
Mapbox integration working - map loads with WebGL, shows cargas markers
Cargas list displays 6 items with accept buttons functional
Envios page shows 4 items with progress bars
Transportistas page shows 5 items with proper status badges
Responsive design and UI components properly styled

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (chat interaction blocked by overlay, but all other features working)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI chat endpoint (likely Emergent LLM integration timeout/error causing 520 server errors) and resolve chat widget overlay issue preventing user clicks
